name
	Profit
description
	In order to become wealthy
	As a stakeholder
	I want the complex things to happen quickly and cheaply

	Acceptance:
	* do the thing
	* don't forget the other thing
	* remember something else
labels
	money,power,fame
==================
name
	Eat more manatee
description
	In order to become reviled
	As a hungry person
	I want to popularize my consumption of manatee

	Acceptance:
	* tasty manatee eaten by me
	* manatee numbers decline
==================

description
